FuncDef:
The reauthentication interval command sets the interval for re-authentication for online dot1x template users.
The undo reauthentication interval command restores the default setting.
By default, the interval for re-authentication for online dot1x template users is 57600 seconds.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the interval for re-authentication.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 65535, in seconds. If the value is set to 0, no re-authentication is performed.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If users go online through 802.1X authentication, run the reauthentication interval command to set the interval for the BRAS to send re-authentication request packets. If re-authentication fails, the users are logged out to ensure that only authorized users can access the network.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
